channel.title: Rune-Legacy 24/7 Reborn
channel.description:
[center][img]http://rune-legacy.hostzi.com/Image.gif[/img]
[size=12pt][font=arial black]I DONT OWN THE SERVER! AND I DIDENT MAKE IT![/font][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://rune-legacy.hostzi.com]Homepage[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://rune-legacy.hostzi.com/index.php?]Forums[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://rune-legacy.hostzi.com/play.php]Play Now[/url]
Main Features:
-100% Uptime -Pk and Skilling -Castle Wars -Party Room -Full Hunter with Swamp Lizards, Implings, Birds, Kebbits, Chinchompas. -Unique Quests -Clue Scrolls
Player Killing:
-PvP Armor -Dragon Claws -Anchor -Lunar Spells -Spirit Shields
Minigames:
-Castle Wars -Warrior's Guild -Duel Arena & Staking -Party Room -Pest Control -Assault -Barrow Brothers -Tokkul/Thzaar Minigame
Bosses:
-Barrelchest -Kalphite Queen -Giant Mole -Chaos Elements -Godwars Dungeon -Dagganoth Kings -Steel Dragon -King Black Dragon -TzTok-Jad
Skilling:
-Elegant Robes -Desert Robes -Lantern -Flowers -Hats -Scarves -Skiller Points & Shop -Ring of Stone Skillers Area -23 working skills including Hunter -More content added every day
[img]http://rune-legacy.com/img/RuneLegacyImage2.png[/img] [img]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m538/xgenesisr/hunter1.png[/img] [img]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m538/xgenesisr/86players.png[/img] [img]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m538/xgenesisr/cwars2.png[/img][/center]
